Name: Nice Pear
Ingredients: 15 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Despite the "no missus" Frankie Howerd-like, English seaside postcard humour name, this is a very tasteful cocktail – pear and cognac is a delicious flavour combination.
Nutrition: One serving of Nice Pear contains 164 calories
